entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is checking if his eyes are working properly.

entities.name: amos diggory
entities.description: A person whose head is sitting in flames and talking to Mr. Weasley.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley's wife, who is breathlessly giving him a piece of parchment, ink, and a quill.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: A person whose office is being visited by Mr. Diggory's head, and who is trying to figure out what happened.

entities.name: rita skeeter
entities.description: A journalist who might get hold of the story if it gets out.

entities.name: mad-eye
entities.description: A person whose opinion Mr. Weasley is seeking on what happened.

relationships.description: Mr. Diggory's head is talking to Mr. Weasley about the Improper Use of Magic lot and Rita Skeeter.
Mrs. Weasley is giving Mr. Weasley a piece of parchment, ink, and a quill to help him with the situation.
Mr. Weasley is seeking Mad-Eye's opinion on what happened.
